title: Why does Frostblade Irelia not have a special recall?
body: Infiltrator got one and it's a legacy skin. The recall should be there considering they are the same price and it just adds to the skin as a whole. Please add a recall Riot.

replies.body: It's getting animated right now! I'd estimate it'll be on PBE by Friday.

This is awesome, props to you folks at Riot for taking care of things :)

That said, has [the post by RedPanda](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/VAsVuldB-frostblade-irelia-feels-like-dragonslayer-pantheon-all-over-again?) been seen or discussed internally yet? They analyze the Frostblade Splash Art and talk about some very specific ways in which it is not delivering on expected themes and character personality.

As a neutral party with few opinions about the skin I was quite swayed by their rhetoric, and I believe it warrants consideration.

> [{quoted}](name=HalcyonDweller,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rNYfOn62,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-03-21T00:33:46.493+0000)
>
> This is awesome, props to you folks at Riot for taking care of things :)
> 
> That said, has [the post by RedPanda](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/VAsVuldB-frostblade-irelia-feels-like-dragonslayer-pantheon-all-over-again?) been seen or discussed internally yet? They analyze the Frostblade Splash Art and talk about some very specific ways in which it is not delivering on expected themes and character personality.
> 
> As a neutral party with few opinions about the skin I was quite swayed by their rhetoric, and I believe it warrants consideration.

Idk, I'm on sound so I've been in a room by myself most the day lmao. I can send this over to the splash team to have a read. I know they will take the time to look over what RedPanda is saying!

> [{quoted}](name=El DragÃ³n Blanco,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rNYfOn62,comment-id=0002000000000003,timestamp=2018-04-02T11:02:11.837+0000)
>
> Hello Vonderhamz,
> 
> I saw on reddit you help people to understand certain Irelia VO lines (OMW near ally, for example).
> 
> I tried to find the "survive a teamfight" lines, but nothing ._.
> 
> Can you help me? When do you hear this group?
> 
> ######Sorry for the comment. I couldn't find Vonderhamz's Twitter.

Hahah  no twitter for me :p I believe her surviving a teamfight happens when you have 2 or more allies die around you. Should be after the announcer talks. It might not work immediately if she had just said a move or attack line, but should happen every few teamfights!

sorry for bothering. On the wikia there's this Illaoi quote "All on Buhru take this test - I passed it long ago." and is placed on "Unknown". I don't think i ever heard it as well. Is it something that was decided not to be put in game (but was left in the files), a bug, or just a fan made?
wow thx, how did you check it?
uh, i see. Thx a lot for telling me. I've updated the Illaoi wikia quotes page with what you said. Even if it's not 100% sure it is still better than "Unknown"
so you know or not where this quote is coming from?

> [{quoted}](name=Vonderhamz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rNYfOn62,comment-id=00020000000000030000,timestamp=2018-04-02T19:28:42.924+0000)
>
>...I believe her surviving a teamfight happens when you have 2 or more allies die around you. ...should happen every few teamfights!

It's like you know my team mates O.o

Oh cool! I can relate to sequestering oneself off alone with their work... I spend many days hiding and just working on my projects.

Thank you for passing it along! I'm sure RedPanda will be grateful for the consideration :)
COOL! Tank you <3 {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

> [{quoted}](name=Vonderhamz,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rNYfOn62,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-03-21T00:32:13.571+0000)
>
> It's getting animated right now! I'd estimate it'll be on PBE by Friday.

Do you think you could fix OotL's in-game hair as well? It just looks...clumpy...with those 3 tails.

I just checked all the changes you did, you removed the fur that nobody liked, changed the hair, changed her clothes tones a little, got her the recall and there's one thing that i don't like. Her blades, they're literally dark blue and go to light purple as she stacks her passive why not just leave the old blades to match her hair and outfit in general and just make her blades go from the old ones to the new ones as they turn into glowing blue rather than purple, it would just match the ice theme way better but I'm really really proud of u guys, u did an amazing job in general when it comes to Irelia, also one question. Why does Infiltrator Irelia not have the black headpiece and pink eyes in game? She looks way better on the splashart, it looks like she has some amazing black headphone thingies and in game it just doesn't have anything to connect the two pieces into the one headphonish looking headpiece, also pls fix Infiltrator Irelia's eyecolour to pink and make her hair less like old Irelia it looks like a cape rather than hair, like pls guys ilysm and everything u do
Out of curiosity what does the new recall look like? I can't seem to find it anywhere online
She does some kind of a dance in the air with her blades and then she steps on the ground and forms her blades into a snowflake
She has the booty at least

> [{quoted}](name=Vapor Wave Vibes,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=rNYfOn62,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-20T21:30:01.596+0000)
>
> She has the booty at least

It shrunk :S

Have you seen the in-game model's booty though? >.>

Sure, the splash art's is definitely smaller, but the in-game model is a whole 'nother story
Sadly it is blocked by that huge and ugly fur
well I have some news for you

Yeah thats really odd.
Usually they do give us special recalls for 975-skins.
Frostblade and Infiltrator are the ones I really like and find the best, but there's some thingies yet to be fixed. Riot was really amazing this time {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Because it's a work in progress on the PBE?
It's good to know we will have one but skins usually get the recall on PBE when released.
